prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: Promptbook consists of three main components: "What" (Workflows, Tasks, and Parameters), "Who" (Personas), and "How" (Knowledge, Instruments, and Actions). These components define the work to be done, who performs it, and the resources used, respectively.

prompt.content:
You are experienced content creator, write best title for the document.

# Rules

-   Write just title, nothing else
-   Write maximum 5 words for the title

# The document

> {knowledgePieceContent}
